Class GameSettings

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.model.GameSettings
public class GameSettings extends Object
Manages game settings with persistence using Java Preferences API. Settings are automatically saved and loaded from user preferences.

    • GameSettings

      public GameSettings()

  • Method Details

    • load

      public static void load()
      Loads settings from persistent storage. Uses default values if no saved settings exist.

    • save

      public static void save()
      Saves current settings to persistent storage.

    • reset

      public static void reset()
      Resets all settings to their default values and saves them.

    • isShowAnimations

      public static boolean isShowAnimations()
      Checks if animations are enabled.
      Returns:
      true if animations are enabled, false otherwise

    • setShowAnimations

      public static void setShowAnimations(boolean showAnimations)
      Sets whether animations should be displayed.
      Parameters:
      showAnimations - true to enable animations, false to disable

    • isShowGhostPiece

      public static boolean isShowGhostPiece()
      Checks if ghost piece preview is enabled.
      Returns:
      true if ghost piece is shown, false otherwise

    • setShowGhostPiece

      public static void setShowGhostPiece(boolean showGhostPiece)
      Sets whether the ghost piece preview should be displayed.
      Parameters:
      showGhostPiece - true to show ghost piece, false to hide

    • getSoundVolume

      public static double getSoundVolume()
      Gets the current sound effect volume.
      Returns:
      Volume level between 0.0 and 1.0

    • setSoundVolume

      public static void setSoundVolume(double soundVolume)
      Sets the sound effect volume.
      Parameters:
      soundVolume - Volume level between 0.0 and 1.0 (clamped automatically)

    • getMusicVolume

      public static double getMusicVolume()
      Gets the current music volume.
      Returns:
      Volume level between 0.0 and 1.0

    • setMusicVolume

      public static void setMusicVolume(double musicVolume)
      Sets the music volume.
      Parameters:
      musicVolume - Volume level between 0.0 and 1.0 (clamped automatically)
